question: Who of the following was the first viceroy of India?
explanation: Lord Canning served as a governor-general of India from the year 1856 to 1857. In the year 1858, the act of the better government of India passed. As per the act, the governor-general of India was declared as the viceroy of India. Lord Canning is the first viceroy of India as well as the last governor-general of India.
